Join Our Team

We’re building a team of curious thinkers and creative doers—people who care deeply about craft, culture, and collaboration. We thrive on diversity—in people, perspectives, and possibilities. If you're passionate about humanizing technology, shaping experiences,and looking for a place to grow, contribute, and create meaningful work—whether full-time, freelance, or as a summer intern—we’d love to hear from you. Below are our current vacancies, Don’t see a role that’s speaking to you? E-mail us with your portfolios at—people@wearepointof.com

Current Vacancies

Visual Designer

EXPERIENCE: 3+ YEARS • LOCATION: REMOTE • IMMEDIATE–FULL TIMEV

We're on the lookout for a friendly, bright and well-informed designer with agency experience, a solid portfolio that spans brand identity, typography, and web/digital design. As a strategy-driven agency, we're after someone who can help define our visual style and bring it to life. You’ll need to be a team player, working alongside our crew to lead design efforts and nail client expectations every time.

REQUIREMENTS:
  • Strong communication abilities and initiative
  • Excellent research skills
  • Experience with relevant tools or software
  • Pitch presentations and deck making
  • Education: Design / visual communication
  • Studio/Agency experience is a must
  • Proficiency in AI-driven tools and workflows is a strong advantage
SOFTWARE SKILLS:

Adobe Creative Cloud,

apply
